Plot: In 1915, T.S. (Tom) Eliot and Vivienne Haigh-Wood elope, but her longstanding gynecological and emotional problems disrupt their planned honeymoon. Her father is angry because Tom's poetry ...
Title: Tom & Viv
Writer: Michael Hastings (play), Michael Hastings, Adrian Hodges
Actors: Willem Dafoe, Miranda Richardson, Rosemary Harris, Tim Dutton
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 3 nominations.
